page.title: 09ROADS AND ROAD TRANSPORT
page.content: Our Domesday block is quite well served by a good network of roads.It has trunk roads which deals with the main traffic,and secondary roads which serve the smaller settlements and carry lighter traffic. The main trunk road in our block is the A650.Over the last 30 years there has been a lot of controversy about the A650 and the proposed building of the AIRE VALLEY TRUNK ROAD.Some people are opposed to the plans because they say the environment and natural habitat of wild animals would be spoiled.The other side of the argument is that the AIRE VALLEY TRUNK ROAD would take the strain off the A650,which is very busy at times. Whatever the reasons the fact still remains that the road has still not been built and seems likely to stay that way for a few years at least.
